text: James Hooton (born 13 July 1973) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the role of Sam Dingle in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (1995–1998, 2000–present). ==Career== In addition to his work on Emmerdale, he has also appeared in several other programmes, including Peak Practice, The Bill, Heartbeat and Touching Evil. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Nottinghamshire
title: James Hooton
